---
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
a=c("jan","feb","mar","apr")
a
as.numeric(a)
class(a)
b=as.factor(a)
as.numeric(b)
b
# Missing Value test
c=c(1,2,3,NA,NA,5)
is.na(c)
d=c("jan",NA,"feb")
is.na(d)
# Null value
e=c(NULL,3,4)
is.null(e)
f=NULL
is.null(f)
```
